Package com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers

Class RentFilmController

java.lang.Object
com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.RentFilmController
public class RentFilmController extends Object
Controller class for the rent film view This class is responsible for handling the user input and handling the renting of the selected film
Author:
Agata (Agy) Olaussen (@agyCoding)
